summary: AN ORDINANCE retitling, reclassifying and fixing compensation for certain positions in Parks and Recreation Department and City Light; authorizing execution of a Memorandum of Understanding with the Joint Crafts Council and its affiliate, Public Service and Industrial Employees, Local 1239, amending Appendix "K" of the collective bargaining agreement between the City and the Joint Crafts Council to add the titles Grounds Equipment Mechanic and Senior Grounds Equipment Mechanic; and providing payment therefor.
